creator: mowest9999

content:
Die von dir zitierte Fehlermeldung bedeutet, dass du dein Thunderbird Profil kürzlich mit einer jüngeren (neueren) Thunderbird-Version benutzt hast und es jetzt wieder mit einer älteren Version benutzen willst. Beispiel: du hast nach einem Update auf eine aktuelle Version wieder eine ältere TB Version installiert und versuchst, diese im selben Profil zu öffnen.

Um deine derzeitige TB Version erfolgreich im vorhandenen Profil zu benutzen, musst du Thunderbird in der Kommandozeile mit dem Parameter --allow-downgrade starten: Siehe auch https://support.mozilla.org/de/kb/gesondertes-profil-fur-thunderbird-installationen
creator: Mapenzi

content:
If the accounts are POP, the transition is simple. Just copy the entire profile with these steps: Here is the link for moving a profile in Windows when installed in default location: 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/moving-thunderbird-data-to-a-new-computer

here is the info in brief steps:

  1. ensure thunderbird is NOT running on old machine
  2. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  3. this should open windows file explorer in Appdata\roaming folder
  4. highlight the Thunderbird folder and copy to external media
  5. ensure thunderbird is installed on second computer and NOT running
  6. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  7. you should be in Appdata\roaming folder , copy&paste the exported Thunderbird folder there. This may prompt to overwrite an existing folder of same name. allow it
  8. start thunderbird and all should be there

If the account is IMAP and closed, you should first COPY (not move) all messages in the CLOSED acccount to Local Folders and then do the above steps.

creator: @next

content:
E' la prima cosa che ho fatto quando si è presentato il problema e questa è stata la loro risposta:

Buongiorno,

per quanto riguarda l'errore "message has lines too long for transport", posso confermare che la risposta automatica non viene gestita dal nostro server, quindi dal vostro cPanel, ma è stata impostata direttamente sul vostro client di posta.

Consigliamo di gestire la risposta automatica con noi, in modo tale da aver pieno controllo e supporto in fase di problemi.

Al momento posso confermarle che l'errore menziona il fatto che il vostro client spedisce la risposta automatica in maniera illecita.

Qualora avesse bisogno di sapere come gestirla attraverso noi, potete farlo direttamente dalla vostra webmail: https://webmail.beloedil.ch/ Nelle impostazioni a sinistra, successivamente "Risposte", infine il "+" in alto a destra.

Restiamo pertanto a vostra completa disposizione, cordiali saluti.

Il fatto è che io preferirei fare tutto come ora e lasciare a Thunderbird gestire queste risposte!
creator: olivio.beloedil

content:
Bonjour, pour résoudre ton problème on aura besoin de. quantité de copies d'écran. Si tu arrives à démarrer/ouvrir Thunderbird va au menu Aide > Informations de dépannage > Dossier de profil > Ouvrir le dossier .... ensuite ferme TB. Maintenant tu devrais voir ce qu'on appelle le dossier de profil avec un comme xxxxxxxx.default-release (ou similaire). Dans la hiérarchie des dossiers du gestionnaire de fichiers de Windows monte au niveau au-dessus en affichant le contenu du dossier "Profiles" : fais une copie d'écran de son contenu. Monte encore d'un niveau dans la hiérarchie des dossiers pour voir le contenu du dossier "Thunderbird". Dans ce dossier tu devrais voir un fichier "profiles.ini" Ouvre ce fichier dans un éditeur de texte et fais-en une copie d'écran....

Question complémentaire: quand tu démarres TB que vois-tu dans la fenêtre qui s'affiche? Est-ce que TB te demande de configurer une adresse émail existante?
creator: Mapenzi

content: You are likely referring to my guidelines. The MUST was included as a reminder, as some people incorrectly were pasting to the appdata\roaming\thunderbird folder. Following my suggested steps, that was because installing and starting thunderbird causes the profile to be created. the transition was to overlay that completely and those who followed the process were successful. You can verify that by installing and closing thunderbird and then browsing the appdata\roaming folder, where you will see a thunderbird folder. A possibility of not seeing that folder occurs when the user installs thunderbird from microsoft, as that release uses a different location for the profile.

creator: Mapenzi

content:
Il tuo IP è in una blocklist, probabilmente per spam o per altre attività anomale (non significa necessariamente che tu ne sia l'autore).

Prova a farti assegnare un IP diverso dal tuo internet provider (spesso basta spegnere il modem per qualche minuto e poi riaccenderlo).

Oppure contatta IOL/Libero/Virgilio e segnala la situazione.

In ogni caso non riguarda Thunderbird che si limita a mostrarti il messaggio di errore che riceve dal server.

content: And, as mysteriously as it started failing... after a day, it has just as mysteriously started working again! No idea why, perhaps it was something on the provider's end. I just hope it continues working!
creator: reb5055

content:
Start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem change?
creator: wsmwk

content: No but I did find something in another post that seems to have solved the problem. I selected the Profile folder, selected properties and unchecked Read Only which changed every file in the profile to readable. This appears to have done the trick so far having restored my address book and allowing me to send emails again. It is not auto loading addresses yet but I will look into that and I can live with it for now.
creator: craig109

content: CalDAv is a calendar extension to the more general WEBDAV standard. It contains no specifications for tasks so task are not included in any caldav calendar.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thunderbird is an application installed on your local machine. It stores nothing on the web. If you use IMAP mail you may access mail using your mail providers web mail or a phone. If you contact are synced to that mail provider they also may be visible in the providers webmail (not outlook/Hotmail at this time for calendars of contacts.)
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Crashing, so you will be able to post crash ids for those crashes.
